summary: A small mod that adds versions of the Dawnguard Vampire Armor as clothing. Dawnguard obviously required.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/QtD7v94.png[/img][/url][/center]


A request from the Nexus forums where pieces of Vampire Armor have had their armor rating removed. I made them separate pieces, so random vampires you see around will still wear the "armor" versions.

The new clothing versions can be found inside two coffins outside Broken Fang Cave in Whiterun, between Swindler's Den and Sunderstone Gorge. They hold regular and enchanted clothing each. An optional file also includes the Royal Armor cuirass and Serana's Hood (renamed Vampire Hood), so pick only one.

Needless to say, this lil mod requires Dawnguard, and Update.esm. That should be all. Let me know if there's any problem with them!


[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
author: Jokerine

files.name: Vampire Armor as Clothing plus Royal Outfit and Serana Hood - Fixed
